document.full_text: a fight between the u.s. government and the st. louis art museum over a death mask from ancient egypt intensified on wednesday as the government formally demanded the museum hand over the disputed object.
document.title: u.s. demands art museum hand over egyptian artifact
lines_and_colors: a fight between the u.s. government and the st. louis art museum over a death mask from ancient egypt intensified on wednesday as the government formally demanded the museum hand over the disputed object.
